channel.title: Sunil Swain Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Sunil Swain Blog

item.title: Myblog1
item.description: Ahoy Comrades! Step1) I made a public repo to create my website with github pages Step2) Then i install Hugo Step3) Then i did some quickstart guide from Hugo to get familiarise how to create a site in hugo and put theme title. Step4) Then i created another repo named Hugo-blog where there is the actual code and we are iterating all our posts and all from. Step5) Then created new site by using hugo new site sitename Step6) Selected a theme from hugo and applied it Step7)edited the baseURL title and theme using gedit in hugo.
